backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing implemented Valentine UI features, associated files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files for the Valentine app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for layout and UI elements.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app at #root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main Valentine UI with moving 'No' button, 'Yes' success state, meme reveal, and themed styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, login flow, stored identity restoration, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing since the app performs no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Theme-focused Tailwind stylesheet defining Valentine color variables and custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint setting up React, Internet Identity provider, react‑query client, and loading global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, content scanning, extended color palette using CSS variables, custom animations, and utility extensions for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a Valentine-themed interactive page, its features, required assets, and pending requests for evasive No button behavior and a celebratory Yes flow.
